actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to correct the boundaries of the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Unit L06, Topsail, North Carolina.

summary.text: Replaces the map included in the set of maps entitled "Coastal Barrier Resources System" (referred to in specified provisions of the Coastal Barrier Resources Act and relating to Unit L06 in Topsail, North Carolina) with the map entitled "John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Corrected Unit L06."

titles.title: A bill to correct the boundaries of the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Unit L06, Topsail, North Carolina.
